onCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y emacs && gh repo clone galacticusorg/datasets /workspaces/datasets
updateContentCommand: git -C /workspaces/datasets pull && wget https://github.com/galacticusorg/galacticus/releases/download/bleeding-edge/Galacticus.exe -O $GALACTICUS_EXEC_PATH/Galacticus.exe; wget https://github.com/galacticusorg/galacticus/releases/download/bleeding-edge/tools.tar.bz2 -O $GALACTICUS_DATA_PATH/tools.tar.bz2 && tar -C $GALACTICUS_DATA_PATH xvfj tools.tar.bz2
